WRITING.TEXT: Not my idea, but in a thread a while ago, someone said that they stop and think about all the negative emotions and how bad they feel directly after PMO, whenever they are tempted. I've been trying this, and it honestly does bring you down from those euphoric feelings that accompany looking at P.
Could you see the other passageways branching off as you went down? Also any pics from inside the well?
I don't know why people are down voting, this is an amazing idea.
Wow, one of the coolest experiences I've read.
